li.p: From version 8.5.5, you might see the TinyMCE logo on the email body template in Email Settings, but not on the final email sent to the recipient list. TinyMCE is an open-source licensed under MIT. The logo appears because Katalon Studio upgraded the TinyMCE to version 6.2.0 to ensure security.

conbody.p: To customize the email's body templates:
For Test Suite's email, click Edit Template for Test Suite Execution or go to Project/Settings/Email/Template/Test Suite.

ul.li: deviceId: Id of the executed device
deviceName: Name of the executed device
suiteId: Id of the test suite
suiteName: Name of the test suite
executionProfile: Profile for Test Suite execution

conbody.p: For Test Suite Collection's email, Edit Template for Test Suite Collection Execution or go to Project/Settings/Email/Template/Test Suite Collection.
All fields in the templates are editable. Click Apply when finished.

li.p: executionProfile is not available in the Test Suite Collection Execution email reports.

ul.li: suiteCollectionName: Name of Test Suite Collection
startTime: When the Test Suite Collection started running
duration: The duration of test execution
